parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all items assigned to the [[secondaryWeapon]] except magazines. Use [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]] command for the latter. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''secondaryWeaponItems''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] -  [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[secondaryWeaponItems]] [[player]]; //["","","",""]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[weaponAccessories]], [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[binocularItems]], [[weaponsItems]], [[weaponsItemsCargo]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
